name: The Shrek
description:
Can you collect all the onions before dinner time...?

Play this stupid horror game where Shrek demands his onions! Play Donkey Mode (For Noobs) Normal Mode or All Star Mode (If you're determined)

Be careful to check the quality of those onions, some might be a bit dodgy

If you can beat All Star Mode with 15 Seconds left you are Godly

Inspired by Slender Man game
